name: Norbi Samu
title: Product Manager
tagline: Building products that solve real problems. Experienced in B2B SaaS, HR Tech, and PropTech.
about: I'm a Product Manager with experience across HR Tech, PropTech, and talent management platforms. I've worked with companies ranging from early-stage startups to scale-ups, helping them define product strategy, ship features that users love, and drive measurable business outcomes.
My approach combines deep user empathy with data-driven decision making. I believe great products come from truly understanding customer problems before jumping to solutions.
